channel.title: On Thin Ice on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in On Thin Ice on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Antarctica Is Changing Rapidly. The Consequences Could Be Dire
item.description: “Abrupt changes” threaten to send the continent past the point of no return, at which point continued ice-melting would submerge coastal cities around the world.
